Detailed Description

SlimXmlPattern is a class that encapsulate pattern matching mechanisms on xml document.

SlimXmlPattern understand pattern expressed in the xml-language defined by http://iihm.imag.fr/balme/sxp/01/pattern namespace. To be usable, an xml-expressed pattern have to be compile to a Pattern object. A match result is a XML structure that comply http://iihm.imag.fr/balme/sxp/01/result

Member Function Documentation

Pattern* SlimXmlPattern::compile_pattern (  XmlNode *  pattern  ) 
 

Compile a pattern stored in an XML structure. This XML structure must be obtained by parsing an xml-formatted pattern compliant with http://iihm.imag.fr/balme/sxp/01/pattern namespace

Parameters:
pattern is a pointer to a null-terminated string that contains an xml-formated pattern.
Returns:
a reference to a Pattern object, or NULL if an error occurs while compiling. an error code

Pattern* SlimXmlPattern::compile_pattern (  const char *  pattern  ) 
 

Compile a xml-formated pattern. This xml-expressed pattern must comply with http://iihm.imag.fr/balme/sxp/01/pattern namespace.

Parameters:
pattern is a pointer to a null-terminated string that contains an xml-formated pattern.
Returns:
a reference to a Pattern object, or NULL if an error occurs while compiling.

the last error code

XmlNode* SlimXmlPattern::getMatch (  XmlNode *  source,
Pattern *  pattern
) 
 

Test if the XML structure contained in source match the pattern pattern. If one or more match are found in source, getMatch() will return an XmlNode object containing the result.

Parameters:
source contains an XML structure to analyse.
pattern is a valid compiled pattern object.
Returns:
an XML structure containing a result if getMatch() found a match, NULL else.

XmlNode* SlimXmlPattern::getMatch (  const char *  source,
Pattern *  pattern
) 
 

Test if the xml-formated string contained in source match the pattern pattern. If one or more match are found in source, getMatch() will return an XmlNode object containing the result.

Parameters:
source contains the xml-formated string to analyse.
pattern is a valid compiled pattern object.
Returns:
an XML structure containing a result if getMatch() found a match, NULL else.
